data.title: Biomedical and Molecular Sciences
data.text:
Lab website: www.mitometablab.com

Academic Experience

2015-2020: CIHR and CVN Postdoctoral Fellow (Stephen Archer), Department of Medicine, Queen’s University

2009-2014: PhD in Molecular & Cellular Pathology (Scott Ballinger), Department of Pathology, University of Alabama at Birmingham

2006-2008: MPS in Forensic Science (Robert Shaler), Eberly College of Science, The Pennsylvania State University

2002-2006: B.Sc. (Hons.) in Applied Bio-Molecular Science (Carney Matheson), Faculty of Science & Environmental Studies, Lakehead University

Research Interests

My laboratory studies cardiovascular and cardiometabolic diseases. Using in vitro and in vivo preclinical models, we investigate the role of mitochondrial genetics and organelle structure in the aetiology and pathophysiology of these complex pathologies. Please visit the lab’s website for more information: www.mitometablab.com

Funding Support

New Frontiers Research Fund
